overview:
Chintan Zaveri is an Open Source Software Consultant with a background in Photography & Printing. His interests consist of:

  1. Understanding human (and other) Psychology and utilizing this understanding for designing effective philosophies and strategies for curing social evils;
  2. Finding technically sound solutions to non-technical problems and vice-versa;
